post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, December 21
post.Content:
I hope everyone is starting to wind down for the holiday season, I know I certainly am. It seems like perhaps the Java desktop community bloggers are also starting to take it easy before the holidays, as the links this week are a fair bit quieter than normal. In any case, I hope everyone has a festive and safe holiday season, and I will see you on the other side! Enjoy :-)

  • Gluon posted an interview with Saxonia Systems about how they are working on Scene Builder together.
  • Robert Ladst√§tter has blogged about using the JavaFX TableView control from Scala.
  • Carl has blogged about sprite programming with JavaFX and Scene Builder.
  • David Bell has a post about a game he has created with JavaFX.
